name: create-fastify-bun-starter
description: Scaffold a complete Fastify + Bun environment with minimal dependencies! TypeScript-only, REST/Swagger, CLI support, Wolfi-Docker, cluster, testing, benchmarks and more...

scripts.build: docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(bun -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target prod -t fastify-bun-starter:latest . && docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(bun -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target scan . && docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(bun -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target logs --output type=local,dest=./build-logs .
scripts.clean: bun script/rimraf.ts -- -q dist build build-logs coverage node_modules .cache .vitest *.log *.cpuprofile
scripts.test: bun run lint && bun script/run-tests.ts && bun script/coverage-report.ts
scripts.test:verbose: bun run lint && tsc -p ./tsconfig.verbose.json && bun script/run-tests.ts --verbose && bun script/coverage-report.ts

author: eram@weblegions.com
